description: Charming one bed, one bath railroad style apartment with a large living room and kitchen.  Near Steinway in a prime Astoria location.  The apartment is on the third floor of a walk-up building.  Bedroom is cozy with a queen-sized bed.  Near many restaurants and shops.  Residential neighborhood feel.  There is a school playground/neighborhood square park with basketball, handball courts. Close to three laundromats, a dry cleaner, a few grocery stores and a bodega.  A couple of blocks from Cavo.
name: Railroad Style 1 B.R. Astoria Bachelor Pad
review: Great place, close to the subway. I surely recommend it.
